page.title: 03 ******EDUCATION******
page.content:
{WILLINGTON PRIMARY SCHOOL-
In 1985 there are 209 children on the school roll. The school was built in two phases. The first phase was built in 1970, now the infant area,and opened on February 1971.In 1973 the present lower junior area was built. In the school there are eight teachers,two welfare assistants,a clerical assistant,a cook and her two assistants.We also have two caretakers and a cleaner. The building is separated into three units; infants, lower juniors and upper juniors.Each of the lower junior classes has a mixture of first and second year children and the upper junior classes have a mixture of third and fourth years.The school is sited centrally in the village.
